name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Zavier SANCHEZ, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Zavier SANCHEZ, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of January, 2015, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Although counsel was negligent, Petitioner is entitled to a counsel-filed Petition for Allowance of Appeal. See Pa.Crim.P. 122. Counsel is DIRECTED to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 15 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
108 A.3d 1280
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Zavier SANCHEZ, Petitioner.
No. 179 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 27, 2015.
